item.title: I Am Like Python and R But Not Quite
item.description: A mini-funny Julia crash course for Python and R users Hello, World! I’m Julia. I’m like Python and R but I have my personality. You can run me online to follow this tutorial if you haven’t installed me already. Printing I can print everything using print() or println() print(): prints on the same line println(): adds a new line to the end of the output println("Hello, I'm Julia") ## Hello, I'm Julia println("I'm like like Python and R, but not quite") ## I'm like like Python and R, but not quite Package management Installing a package I install new packages using:
